description: Detects a service binary running in a suspicious directory
name: Suspicious Service Binary Directory
query: (process.executable.text:(*\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\$Recycle.bin* OR *\\Users\\All\ Users\\* OR *\\Users\\Default\\* OR *\\Users\\Contacts\\* OR *\\Users\\Searches\\* OR *C\:\\Perflogs\\* OR *\\config\\systemprofile\\* OR *\\Windows\\Fonts\\* OR *\\Windows\\IME\\* OR *\\Windows\\addins\\*) AND process.parent.executable.text:(*\\services.exe OR *\\svchost.exe))
author: Florian Roth
